metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9956 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The route manager in FlightGear before 2016.4.4 allows remote attackers towrite to arbitrary files via a crafted Nasal script.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flightgear - 1:2017.2.1+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flightgear package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2017.2.1+dfsg-4').
